text: The Shaheed Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto Medical University (SZABMU) is a public university in Islamabad, Pakistan. Established on 21 March 2013, it offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses of medicine, surgery, dentistry, basic medical sciences and allied health sciences. == Constituent Institutions == * Federal Medical and Dental College == Affiliated Institutions == * Rawal Institute of Health Sciences * Yusra Medical and Dental College * HBS Medical and Dental College * Islamabad Medical and Dental College * Bashir Institute of Health Science * Prime Institute of Health Sciences * Islamabad Institute of Health Sciences * Institute of Health and Management Sciences == References == == External links == *SZABMU official website Category:Public universities and colleges in Pakistan Category:Universities and colleges in Islamabad Category:Educational institutions established in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in Pakistan Category:Medical colleges in Islamabad Category:Islamabad Capital Territory Category:Memorials to Zulfikar Ali Bhutto
title: Shaheed Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto Medical University
